name: Gob N' Go
description:
You're a small-time thief, looking for the next big job. You've been at this a long time and you know the game, but there's one problem... 

Your budget is tight and all you can afford is a motley crew of untrained goblins. If they can just focus on the plan, you know their mischievous, chaotic nature will be a force for good. Well... not good, but at least a successful heist.

Good luck and gob speed.
